attributes.action: Make Tony James the Carbon Silicon guitarist bring back his top knot hair style.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony James is a renowned musician and singer. During his time with the infamous band Sigue Sigue Sputnik, he kept his hair tied at the top of his crown - a 'top-knot' effect.  Sadly, now he no longer possesses it.  

We the undersign petition the Prime Minister to force Mr. James to reinstate it, be it naturally or prosthetically.  

We believe it will bestow 'gravitas' and bearing upon him, and greatly boost his standing with fans of his band Carbon Silicon.  Do it for all of us, Tony!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
